functionDecorators.name: claimTimeout
functionDecorators.description: if the timeout is reached without the recipient closing the channel, then the Ether is released back to the sender.

functionDecorators.name: close
functionDecorators.description: the recipient can close the channel at any time by presenting a signed amount from the sender. the recipient will be sent that amount, and the remainder will go back to the sender.

functionDecorators.name: extend
functionDecorators.description: the sender can extend the expiration at any time.
